user.title: Power Calc Totals
user.description: Power Calc Totals will automatically discover devices with power sensors that need energy sensors and create discovered integrations for each one.

integration_discovery.title: Add Energy Sensor for {name}
integration_discovery.description: Do you want to add an energy sensor for the power entity **{power_entity}** on device **{name}**?

confirm.title: Confirm Energy Sensor for {name}
confirm.description: This will create an energy sensor for the power entity **{power_entity}** on device **{name}**.

abort.already_configured: Energy sensor is already configured for this power entity
abort.not_supported: Manual configuration is not supported. Power Calc Totals automatically discovers devices that need energy sensors.
